title: I have a missing skin!
body: I just found out that my star guardian lux skin that my friend gifted me is now gone. I don't know what happened but I would like to have someone's thought on this. I check my gifting history and its completely blank, i recieved the skin around August 4-6 of this year, and any non-gifting purchases i did only goes up to august 10.

replies.body: Since this is an account-specific issue, we'll need to do some investigating into it. I'd recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you further.
